          <title>
            <string language="en">Metallic bonding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallisches Abbinden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liaison métallique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligação metálica</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταλλική σύνδεση</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the  a metallic lattice. The 'sea' of electrons surrounds the protons.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das metallische Gitter. 
Das ' Meer ' der Elektronen umgibt die Protone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un trellis métallique.
La 'mer 'des électrons entoure les protons.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um lattice metálico. 
' o mar ' dos elétrons cerca os protons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una grata metallica. 
'il mare 'degli elettroni circonda i protoni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μεταλλικό δικτυωτό 
πλέγμα. Η "θάλασσα" των ηλεκτρονίων περιβάλλει τα πρωτόνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un cedazo metálico. 
El ' mar ' de electrones rodea los protones.</string>
